casebody.data:
In the Matter of EIDINGER & HAGER, Inc., Alleged Bankrupt. MERCHANTS REFRIGERATING COMPANY, a Corporation Incorporated under the Laws of the State of New York, Petitioning Creditor-Appellant, v. EIDINGER & HAGER, Inc., Alleged Bankrupt-Appellee. No. 390. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 18, 1936. Daniel E. Hanlon, of New York City, for appellant. Abraham L. Kramer, of New York City, for Eid'inger & Hager, Inc., alleged bankrupt.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment .and order affirmed.
